body_html:
Any news? CUDNN 7.1.1 has even better support for convolution groups:
http://docs.nvidia.com/deeplearning/sdk/cudnn-release-notes/rel_711.html#rel_711
"All algorithms for convolutions now support groupCount > 1"
This should make things easier.
body_text:
Any news? CUDNN 7.1.1 has even better support for convolution groups:

"All algorithms for convolutions now support groupCount > 1"
This should make things easier.
body:
Any news? CUDNN 7.1.1 has even better support for convolution groups:
http://docs.nvidia.com/deeplearning/sdk/cudnn-release-notes/rel_711.html#rel_711
"All algorithms for convolutions now support groupCount > 1"
This should make things easier.
